title: Little pots of chocolate créme

ingredients.content: 100 g dark chocolate, broken into pieces

preparations.content: Place chocolate and cream into mixing bowl and heat <b>8 min/80°C/speed 2<b>
Add sugar and eggs and mix <b>10 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer chocolate mixture into 6 ramekins (6 cm) and set aside. Clean and dry mixing bowl.

Place water into mixing bowl.  Place Varoma into position, place 3 of the ramekins into it. Place two layers of paper towel on top of the ramekins. Secure Varoma lid and steam <b>25 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Set ramekins aside.

Place remaining 3 ramekins into Varoma dish and cover with two layers of paper towel. Secure Varoma lid and steam <b>25 min/Varoma/speed 2<b>. Leave ramekins to cool (approx. 15 minutes) before serving or place ramekins into refrigerator, then serve chilled.

hintsAndTricks: The little pots of chocolate créme will keep in refrigerator for several days.
Depending on ramekins used you may be able to fit more than 3 in the Varoma to cook at the same time.
